text: 3:20 Rom 3:29-30Egh gumazitam ingangaritam damusɨ gumazir igharazitam ko Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim akɨrsɨ, an a isɨva abuir gumazimɨn dafarim datɨghtɨma, abuir gumazim a isɨva gumazir igharazim danɨngan kogham. Ezɨ God uabɨra, a uabɨ uan Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim Abraham ganɨngi, egha enselɨn tam ganɨngizir puvatɨ, o abuir gumazitam ganɨngizir puvatɨ.
